article.title: SRC Receives Network Sensing Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: SRC Incorporated, North Syracuse, New York, was awarded a $24,545,088 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract. The award will provide for the necessary services in support of the Network Enhancing Sensing Construct. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Monmouth, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
